TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActivityPropertyReference extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a property reference that is used in <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityBuilder"> and that maps to a <xref:System.Activities.XamlIntegration.PropertyReferenceExtension%601> in an `x:Class` activity when the `x:Class` activity is deserialized into an <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityBuilder">.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.ActivityPropertyReference"> class.
Gets or sets the source property name that corresponds to the property name in the `x:Class` activity definition.
Docs.value: The source property name that corresponds to the property name in the `x:Class` activity definition.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the property being set on the target object.
Docs.value: The name of the property being set on the target object.
